WelcomeMsg: Hi, you've reached a counsellor. What would you like to talk about?
GoodbyeMsg: Please take our optional feedback survey to help us improve our service and better understand how we can support you. The first page of the survey explains how we use the data. This survey only takes 5 minutes. Thank you! https://survey.alchemer-ca.com/s3/50188874/Post-Chat-Survey

Be well,
